title: What was the YoY change expressed as a percentage in Elanco's (ELAN) adjusted EBITDA margin for 2Q2025 versus 2Q2024? Please round to two decimals
description:
- The Adjusted EBITDA Margin for 2Q2025 is 19.2% and for 2Q2024 was 23.2%
 
 - Calculate the difference between the 2Q2025 and 2Q2024 Adjusted EBITDA Margin as -4.00%
 
 - Divide the difference in margins, -4.00%, by 23.2% and multiply by 100 to find the percent change

rubric.criteria: Difference between 2Q2025 and 2Q2024 Adjusted EBITDA Margin is -4.00%
Percent change calculated by dividing the -4.00% difference by 23.2% and multiplying by 100
Final Answer (YoY percent change) is -17.24% (rounded to two decimals)
